author: JiaLiPassion
message:
build: update bazel rules_nodejs to version 2.3.1 (#39636)

Update the version `rules_nodejs` to 2.3.1, so the `npm_package.pack` rule
can now work on windows os.

PR Close #39636

files.patch:
@@ -8,8 +8,8 @@ load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
 # Fetch rules_nodejs so we can install our npm dependencies
 http_archive(
     name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
-    sha256 = "4952ef879704ab4ad6729a29007e7094aef213ea79e9f2e94cbe1c9a753e63ef",
-    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/2.2.0/rules_nodejs-2.2.0.tar.gz"],
+    sha256 = "121f17d8b421ce72f3376431c3461cd66bfe14de49059edc7bb008d5aebd16be",
+    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/2.3.1/rules_nodejs-2.3.1.tar.gz"],
 )
 
 # Check the rules_nodejs version and download npm dependencies

@@ -5,8 +5,8 @@ load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
 # Fetch rules_nodejs so we can install our npm dependencies
 http_archive(
     name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
-    sha256 = "4952ef879704ab4ad6729a29007e7094aef213ea79e9f2e94cbe1c9a753e63ef",
-    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/2.2.0/rules_nodejs-2.2.0.tar.gz"],
+    sha256 = "121f17d8b421ce72f3376431c3461cd66bfe14de49059edc7bb008d5aebd16be",
+    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/2.3.1/rules_nodejs-2.3.1.tar.gz"],
 )
 
 # Fetch sass rules for compiling sass files
